Articles.Content:
First I shall seduce the whole forum, then I'll arm them! Then we'll take Squad by force, capture a big-named company like Bethesda, multiply the manpower behind KSP, capture every Toblerone plant worldwide and I shall truly become die Gott-Kaiserin!!!! MWAHAAHAHAHAHH *dramatic lightning*

I... ah, screw it. You will never succeed!

First I shall seduce the whole forum, then I'll arm them! Then we'll take Squad by force, capture a big-named company like Bethesda, multiply the manpower behind KSP, capture every Toblerone plant worldwide and I shall truly become die Gott-Kaiserin!!!! MWAHAAHAHAHAHH *dramatic lightning*

Do you need to seduce us first? We are already pretty much under your power.
Lang lebe die Gott-Kaiserin!
Shut up Canopus, I know it ~<3

I will defend this thread in your absence, oh great Empress!

I'm here, and I am not amused.

I told you guys 10 pages ago that you needed to pace yourselves, a thread quickly degenerates to spam when it is moving this fast. You've gone 15 pages in all of 3 hours.

The best way to defend the thread is to choose a topic, and try to stay on it.
